json: {"add_total_row": 0, "sort_by": "Send Money.modified", "add_totals_row": 0, "sort_order": "desc", "sort_by_next": null, "filters": [], "sort_order_next": "desc", "columns": [["name", "Send Money"], ["posting_date", "Send Money"], ["sender_from_location", "Send Money"], ["amount_send", "Send Money"], ["receiver_name", "Send Money"], ["sender_name", "Send Money"]]}
name: Customer Credit
query:
SELECT sender_name as "Send Full Name", month(posting_date) as Month, year(posting_date) as Year, SUM(total_amount_paid) as "Total Balance"
FROM `tabSend Money`
GROUP BY sender_name, month(posting_date)
